    节流防抖

    # 节流防抖

    • 节流(throttle)：n秒内只执行一次，若在n秒内重复触发只执行一次
    • 防抖(debounce)：n秒后执行，若在n秒内重复触发，则重新计时
    // throttel
function throttle (fn, delay) {
  let timer = null
  return function (...args) {
    if (!timer) {
      timer = settimeout(function(){
        fn.bind(this, args)
        timer = null
      }, delay)
    }
  }
}

// 结合时间戳和定时器写法
function throttle1 (fn, delay) {
  let timer = null
  let startTime = Date.now()

  return function () {
    let currentTime = Date.now()
    let remaining = delay - (currentTime - startTime)
    let ctx = this
    let args = arguments

    clearTimeout(timer)

    if (renaining <=0) {
      fn.apply(this, args)
      startTime = Date.now()
    } else {
      timer = settimeout(fn, remaining)
    }
  }
}

    // debounce

function debounce (fn, delay) {

  let timer = null

  return function () {
    let ctx = this
    let args = arguments
    clearTimeout(timer)
    settimeout(() => {
      fn.apply(ctx, args)
    }, delay)
  }
}

function debounce1 (fn, delay, immediate) {
  let timer = null
  return function () {
    let ctx = this
    let args = arguments
    if (immediate) {
      let callNow = !timer
      if (callNow) {
        fn.appley(ctx, args)
      }
    }

    timer = settimeout(() => {
      fn.appley(ctx, args)
    }, delay)
  }

}

    深拷贝与浅拷贝
